scripts.dev:all: npm run build:packages && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend-server && cross-env DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=5420 DB_NAME=krapi DB_USER=postgres DB_PASSWORD=postgres JWT_SECRET=default-secret-change-this JWT_EXPIRES_IN=7d SESSION_EXPIRES_IN=1h DEFAULT_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin123 PORT=3470 HOST=localhost NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.build:all: npm run build:packages && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:logger && npm run build:error-handler && npm run build:monitor && npm run build:sdk
scripts.start:all: npm run build:all && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:backend: cd backend-server && cross-env DB_HOST=localhost DB_NAME=krapi DB_USER=postgres DB_PASSWORD=postgres JWT_SECRET=default-secret-change-this JWT_EXPIRES_IN=7d SESSION_EXPIRES_IN=1h DEFAULT_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin123 PORT=3470 HOST=localhost NODE_ENV=production npm run start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend-server && npm install && cd ../frontend-manager && npm install && cd ../packages/krapi-sdk && npm install
scripts.clean:all: cd backend-server && rmdir /s /q dist node_modules 2>nul & cd ../frontend-manager && rmdir /s /q .next node_modules 2>nul & cd ../packages/krapi-sdk && rmdir /s /q dist node_modules 2>nul & rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul
scripts.reset: npm run clean:all && npm run install:all
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:sdk
scripts.lint:fix:all: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:sdk
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:sdk
scripts.health: npm run install:all && npm run lint:all && npm run type-check:all && npm run build:all
scripts.dev:cleanup: docker stop krapi-dev-postgres && docker rm krapi-dev-postgres && docker network rm krapi-dev-network
